description.narrative: The purpose of the project is to develop international investment policies, frameworks and partnerships conducive to increasing the flow of long-term investments for growth and sustainable development. The project falls under Danish Aid for Trade program’s Priority Area 1: Connecting SMEs to global and regional value chains through value adding goods and services, supported by sustainable investment, with focus on Indonesia, Cambodia, India and Ghana. The project could also contribute to the ongoing plurilateral negotiations in the WTO on a multilateral framework for Investment Facilitation for Development.

title.narrative: International investment policies, frameworks and partnerships which contribute to the increased flow of long-term investments for growth and sustainable development.

description.narrative: • Progress attained towards international action on Sustainable Investment; • Local Sustainable Investment Facilitation action is catalysed.
